ComicInfo.Summary:
The Bodega Bay Inn has become quite the hotspot! Sure, there’s Samuel creeping around the place doing who-knows-what… and the puppets are being attacked by an unknown enemy… and Anthony gets VERY angry at a specific guest. But three of Mexico’s hottest luchadores just checked in for the night! Nothing bad can happen there, right?
Variant and variant sketch covers limited to 1,500 copies each.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|--------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Antonio Ontiveros (p, i) & Daniel Morales (c) | 1 | | Var | Kill Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Andrew Mangum (p, i) & Gene Jimenez (c) | 2 | | Var | Kill Variant Sketch Cover, Limited to 1500 | Andrew Mangum | 3 | | Var | Cute Cover, Limited to 1500 | Anna Lencioni | 4 |
